subject: Lacrosse
Coaches and Managers
College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Seth Tierney was named to succeed John Danowski, who left Hofstra after 21 seasons to take over the beleaguered program at Duke.
snippet: Seth Tierney was named to succeed John Danowski, who left Hofstra after 21 seasons to take over the beleaguered program at Duke.
